Uses of Class
com.accele.gage.GAGEException

  • Packages that use GAGEException 
    Package Description
    com.accele.gage
    Contains the core components of the General Abstracted Game Engine.
    com.accele.gage.config
    Contains classes used to modify and retrieve global engine settings as well as user-defined settings.

    • Uses of GAGEException in com.accele.gage

      Methods in com.accele.gage that throw GAGEException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      T Resource.get()
      Calls the ResourceLoader this Resource contains using the saved ResourceLocation and any additional arguments and returns the result.
      java.io.InputStream ResourceLocation.getInputStream()
      Returns the InputStream associated with this ResourceLocation.
      T ResourceLoader.load​(ResourceLocation src, java.lang.Object[] additionalArgs)
      Loads the data contained at the specified ResourceLocation using any necessary additional arguments.

    • Uses of GAGEException in com.accele.gage.config

      Methods in com.accele.gage.config that throw GAGEException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Configuration ConfigurationReader.read()
      Retrieves a list of user-defined properties, creates a new Configuration to store them in, registers the Configuration in the configuration registry, and returns the Configuration.
      void GameConfigurationReader.read()
      Retrieves and automatically injects game configuration properties from the specified external source into the GameConfiguration.
      void ConfigurationWriter.write()
      Retrieves a list of user-defined properties from the Configuration with the specified registryId and exports them to the specified external destination.
      void GameConfigurationWriter.write()
      Retrieves game configuration properties from the GameConfiguration and writes them to the specified external destination.
